channel.description: Migrate a user’s password Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Password import inline hook: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/password-import-inline-hook/nodejs/main/ Why is this here?: Based on GroupIt Oktane, data Inline hooks was a split betwen automate and customize with Automate edging out. Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
